body_html: More visibility into memory could help solving the mysterious issue of TF running out of memory on step xyz, even though there are no changes to graph between steps. I've ran across it, and also here

body: More visibility into memory could help solving the mysterious issue of TF running out of memory on step xyz, even though there are no changes to graph between steps. I've ran across it, and also [here](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41540073/why-the-gpu-memory-is-not-the-same)
